LanguageData.VV_AlertViviDangerousEggsDesc: The vivi eggs that are being neglected or in the incubator are being damaged due to inappropriate temperatures. \nIf the eggs are completely damaged, they will be destroyed, so please maintain the temperature where the eggs are stored between {MINTEMP} degrees and {MAXTEMP} degrees.
LanguageData.VV_AlertArcanePlantLowEnergyDesc: The energy held by the plant is very low. If left neglected in a depleted energy state, it will gradually become damaged and eventually be destroyed. \nEnsure the plant has an environment where it can gain energy, or place it next to a plant that produces more energy than its maximum capacity. You can also recharge its energy by applying fertilizer. \nIf conditions do not allow for recharging energy, you can package it to prevent damage.
